companies.description: Information about companies associated with the invoice

contacts.description: Information about contacts associated with the invoice

deals.description: Information about deals associated with the invoice

hs_allow_partial_payments.description: Allow your customer to pay less than the balance due

hs_allowed_payment_methods.description: The payment methods to be used (e.g., credit_or_debit_card, ach)

hs_amount_billed.description: The total amount billed on the invoice

hs_balance_due.description: The balance due on the invoice

hs_collect_address_types.description: The types of addresses that are collected while paying the invoice

hs_comments.description: Add comments to the invoice for the buyer to see

hs_createdate.description: The date and time when the invoice was created

hs_custom_fields.description: The custom fields that have been added to the invoice

hs_due_date.description: Due date of the invoice. Autoset if one is not provided

hs_invoice_date.description: Date of the invoice. Autoset if one is not provided

hs_invoice_payment_collection_method.description: Set to manual for digital payment capability, none for no digital payment capability

hs_invoice_status.description: The current status of the invoice

hs_lastmodifieddate.description: The date and time when the invoice was last modified

hs_object_id.description: The unique identifier of the invoice

hs_recipient_company_address.description: The address of the recipient's company

hs_recipient_company_address2.description: The second line of the address of the recipient's company

hs_recipient_company_city.description: The city of the recipient's company

hs_recipient_company_state.description: The state or region of the recipient's company

hs_recipient_company_zip.description: The postal or zip code of the recipient's company

hs_recipient_shipping_address.description: The shipping address of the recipient

hs_recipient_shipping_address2.description: The second line of the shipping address of the recipient

hs_recipient_shipping_city.description: The shipping city of the recipient

hs_recipient_shipping_country.description: The shipping country of the recipient

hs_recipient_shipping_state.description: The shipping state or region of the recipient

hs_recipient_shipping_zip.description: The shipping postal or zip code of the recipient

hs_tax_id.description: The account tax ID listed on this invoice
